Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory75.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The path is clear now!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Once you all make it into the stairwell, Watanabe secures the airlock.', 5: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'This should keep them busy for a while.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Let's go. The elevator might not work, but surely the stairs will be fine.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Commandant, d\'you think we\'ll find the "King" down there?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What do you think, Nanami?', 3: '15', 4: "It doesn't seem that simple to me."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'No matter who it is, I kinda feel bad for him. I hope we can get him out of there...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Right? Nanami thinks so too!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'AniZhuanchangBegin'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Here we are... This is the door.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The heart of the fortress should be on the other side of the door.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is the CPF really all the way down here?', 3: '23'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "In a doomsday fortress, you don't need to worry about the virus outside. The CPF would therefore be somewhere inside.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "All right, I'm not sure if it's safe on the other side of the door. You all should back up...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Watanabe twists the heavy handle with force. A whoosh of air rushes through the airlock gap.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As the airlock door slowly opens in front of you, you are greeted by a blinding flash, followed quickly by the sound of explosions.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You all drop to the ground, trying to evade whatever weapons that will come flying at you.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The crackle of weapons fire never comes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Up you get. Looks like it was a bluff.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You all stand up slowly to see spent firecrackers , and... a graffitied wall.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: '"All ye who tread upon the domain of the King... This is your punishment!"', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'What a childish thing to say...', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Nanami doesn't think the King is so good anymore!", 4: '2'}
